column5: Our place is very quiet and clean. Comfy queen sized bed and black-out curtain on the window so you can sleep in without with sun waking you.  We are off the beaten path, in a quiet neighborhood east of Austin. A short drive 15-30 minutes (depending on where you are headed and when) to a ton of great Austin sites and sounds.   Our place is perfect if you are looking for a comfortable, clean, quiet private room.
column8: Comfy, Quiet Private Room with Late Check-Out
